text: street art is a core part of Montreal's
soul and identity since 2013 every year
in June the city hosts something called
the mural festival during this festival
artists from around the world gather in
the city for 11 days to repaint some of
Montreal's biggest walls and change the
colors of the city so we decided to give
a tribute to the city by sharing this
part of Montreal's culture one of the
